name: Introduction to Jewelry and Metalsmithing
description: The student will learn the basics of jewelry making and metasmithing, including soldering, sawing, and forging.

name: Intermediate Jewelry and Metalsmithing
description: The student will learn more advanced techniques in jewelry making and metasmithing, including casting, polishing, and texturing.

name: Advanced Jewelry and Metalsmithing
description: The student will learn the most advanced techniques in jewelry making and metasmithing, including CAD and 3D printing, laser cutting, and enameling.
